_header: Remember that there be in hell
Subjects: hell; death, approach of; repentance; transitoriness, of life
_description: Warning to amend life before death — two couplets

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
Remember that there be in hellmany a Sowle I do thee tellthat
                    neuer deseruid as thow hast done[there]fore lament and amend the
                    sone
BLAdd60577.Note:
Added by a sixteenth-century hand to blank space of lower half of page
                    after other texts.
BLAdd60577.Facsimiles:
Wilson,  Edward.

             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional

         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1981.
